content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> be a function that is defined for all real numbers <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Of the following, which is the best interpretation of the statement <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 2, of, f of x, equals 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></munder><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The value of the function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="x equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> is 7.

The value of the function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at <math alttext="x equals 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> is 2.

As <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> approaches 2, the values of <math alttext="f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> approach 7.

As <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> approaches 7, the values of <math alttext="f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> approach 2.

content.answer: As <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> approaches 2, the values of <math alttext="f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> approach 7.
